original_text: Nicodemus also, who earlier had come to Jesus by night, came bringing a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about seventy-five pounds in weight.
korean_text: 일찍이 예수께 밤에 찾아왔던 니고데모도 몰약과 침향 섞은 것을 백 리트라쯤 가지고 온지라

sentences.original_text: Nicodemus also, who earlier had come to Jesus by night,
came bringing a mixture of myrrh and aloes,
sentences.korean_translation: 몰약과 침향을 섞은 향유를 가지고 왔는데,
